name: Shimmering Lantern
description:
A dark and sombre light 'em up in which you have to light up all the pumpkins in a shady little town as the legendary Jack-o'-lantern while the locals try to stop you.

Hover away and defend each of your lanterns while the angry mob attempts to break them or even confront you. Puny mortals!They stand no chance against you! But your poor lanterns can't defend themselves, so you have to be quick as death to succeed.

Overcome your enemies in this battle of elemental colors! Bring the ever-shimmering orange light of joy to this land of corrupt purple plums of withering life! And do it with style, do it with ease, do it with a single mouse button!

Controls

Drag the mouse to move and click to dash.

Damage the enemies with dash, or with touching them!

You can heal back the lanterns, just when they still shimmering!
